InstalledItem.Name: Tarantula GT-870 Mark 3 Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Gallenson Tactical Systems
Item Type: Ballistic Cannon
Size: 3

Fed by Gallenson Tacticalâ€™s patented SpinGlide drum ammunition system, the Tarantula GT-870 Mk3 can smoothly and accurately deliver a consistent stream of ballistic shells. Though it only has a moderate rate of fire, its trustworthy durability makes it a dependable addition to any fight.

InstalledItem.Name: AllStop
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Gorgon Defender Industries
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Gorgon Defender Industries first created the AllStop shield generator to hold off the Vanduul. They worked so well that many military crafts were known to prefer the AllStop. Just one of the many reasons to have one on your ship.
